website_summaries.verdict: This opener works by popping the vacuum seal, and works on most smaller jars.
pros: One easy lift pops the vacuum
Opens most small to medium vacuum-sealed jars
Endorsed by arthritis associations around the world
cons: Doesn't fit larger jars, like spaghetti sauce jars

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK !
customer_reviews.text: Deserves no star . Didn’t even almost work. Tried to open two different jar lids off . Different sizes . Wouldn’t catch under the lid to allow me to lift up . Don’t buy this product . Simply does not work .
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: This jar opener is fabulous. I've struggled with tight jar lids forever. I've used every method available from silicone twisters, hammers, hot water, etc. Nothing is as easy as this little opener. My only caveat is to do a google search. It's a lot cheaper at my local "bath" store. And you can use one of their ubiquitous coupons.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Love this jar opener!!
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, sturdy, what a helper!! I wish that I had this before I ruined so many canning jar lids! Perfect for opening canning jars without punching a hole in the lid with a pointed opener. Even though you are not to re-can with a used lid, if the lids are not damaged they can still be used with a vac. seal. This handy device helps with that. Also works well with Weck plastic lids for Weck glass canning jars. I love this thing!!!
customer_reviews.author: thankful

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my Mom, who was having difficulty opening jars after her Carpal Tunnel surgery. This nifty tool allows her to open those stubborn jars without any strain or stress and she loves it! I'd recommend this tool to anyone who could use an extra hand in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R.

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: The only one that does what it promises to do. I’ve bought so many openers that claim their for seniors or for people with weak hands and returned them all. This one I’m keeping
customer_reviews.author: SandyC

customer_reviews.title: Did not arrive as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy gadget that I wanted to give to a few friends. However, the three that I ordered did not come on a hang-tag as pictured. There were just 3 loose jarkeys in a bag. Anyone new to the product would have no idea what it is used for, its benefits or the best way to use it. Looks like something I could have picked up at Goodwill, not a brand new product. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Best jar opener ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these the first time. One for me, one for my sister who has trouble with her grip and one for my mother who had severe arthritis in her hands. We all loved them. Other friends have seen mine and immediately ordered theirs. This was a gift for another friend. Easiest to use and works every time.
customer_reviews.author: Jan S.

customer_reviews.title: Best Kitchen Gadget Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I can't believe that anyone who has ever struggled to open a jar would not love them. They make opening a jar so easy and effortless that you want to find jars to open just because you can. No batteries, no plug in, nothing hi-tech. Just a simple easy to use piece of sturdy plastic that makes opening jars a breeze. I would like to be able to choose the color myself but since they are inexpensive and everyone you know is sure to want one just order several and keep the one you want.. I would give these 20 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: INSTANTLY BREAKS VACUUM SEAL
customer_reviews.text: Magic! Instantly breaks vacuum seal so you can twist off a Jar Lid with ease. It looks like - and acts like - a larger version of an old-fashioned Beer Bottle Opener. Simple and effective Tool. Use gentle pressure. It doesn't take much effort.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Derringer

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Jar Opener in the world!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best jar opener I have ever used! My mother gave me one several years ago and I searched and searched to find another one like it. I found imitations that didn't work nearly as well nor last as long. These are highly durable, designed perfectly, and do the trick without the user having to be of superhuman strength. Even my grandmother can use this jar opener!! When I found them here on Amazon, I bought one for everybody in my family for Christmas and they love them too. My only drawback is that I wished I could have picked the color(s) I wanted from the merchant.
customer_reviews.author: hilary41

customer_reviews.title: Easiest jar opener I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This works best if the lid is stuck because of the bottle's vacuum sealing.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Best Gadget
customer_reviews.text: I was a little afraid that this gadget might not work. Most of jar openers are big and clumsy. This little thing works perfect. My arthritic hands love it.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic item!! Works perfectly!!
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic item!!!!!! I cannot open jars. Carpal tunnel and neuropathy make it impossible. This does exactly what it says it will. Thank you so much. This is my newest favorite purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: It Actually Works!
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't sure if this would help or not but IT DOES! I'm so glad I decided to get this little gadget....it has lessened the pain in my hands when opening jars! great gismo!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best jar opener out their
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy they work and different colors available so you can find easy in wife's drawer of utensils!
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES WEBER

customer_reviews.title: The best jar opener
customer_reviews.text: This is the best to ever! It will open any jar easily and looks nice too. I’ve tried so many other jar openers and they don’t do the job. This one does. Highly recommend it for every kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like it. I returned. Small piece of plastic. It doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Sally M

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical when I first read about this product, but I don't have the strength to twist off those tight lids. Wife thought it was a waste of money. Anyway, works like a dream. Pop the air seal and lid twists off with no problem. Highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Nashville37

customer_reviews.title: already wrote review
customer_reviews.text: already wrote a review I will say again that we are a long time user and I bought 10 this last purchase. I will continue to purchase for friends and co-workers and replace mine if it ever wares out. My last one is still going strong after 6 years
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work on large jars with thicker lids, which is the whole point when you have wrist issues. Don't buy. I forgot to return within 30 days and remembered day 31 and got stuck with it. Don't waste your money. Buy a good electric one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Faour

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: This little thing works great. Have given several out to girlfriends and they love them too. No need to go looking for a burly-guy to crank open the jars anymore, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Sundari

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use jar opener
customer_reviews.text: Now that I have this great tool, opening jars is so easy. I ordered two, one for myself and the other as a gift. No more struggling with jar openers. It works just as advertised. I highly recommend it for everyone, especially seniors who might have arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Harris Coleman

customer_reviews.title: This will open your sealed mason lids!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently started canning and needed something to open the sealed lids. Wasn't sure this would work but it does.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Seriously, 6!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, some customers thought if buying this advertised product, in different colors, they would get 6 items in all colors for $6.XX. Ignorance is bliss?
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: This product is so great. Makes opening a jar the easiest
customer_reviews.text: This product is so great. Makes opening a jar the easiest. I have purchased for gifts too. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the Jarkey for a few weeks. So far it has opened all the jars I have used it on. I liked it so much that I purchased more to give my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't like that I can't chose what color I receive
customer_reviews.text: Whoever invented this was an absolute genius. I don't like that I can't chose what color I receive, but I do love the fact that it does exactly what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could have picked what color I wanted. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: K Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Chipped immediately, didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even work on the first jar and the plastic chipped
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Look before you leap.
customer_reviews.text: Good product but didn’t come with directions card opener is usually attached to. Just received box with loose openers enclosed. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and wonderful results
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and wonderful results. I have Arthritis in my right hand and I just can't open anything with it. The Jar Key uses other muscles in my hand so I have no pain when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: no more struggle.
customer_reviews.text: an unbelievable jar opener. use frequently. hope to purchase more for friends. amazing.
customer_reviews.author: outerbanxcat

customer_reviews.title: Jar opener
customer_reviews.text: Worked first time I used it. Hope it’s always this easy
customer_reviews.author: Fred Wright

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: This is broken. Unfortunately I didn’t notice in time and cannot return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Love this jar opener
customer_reviews.text: Love this jar opener!! Had to order a couple for my parents after realizing how easy it is to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use to pop open jars and twist off lid.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these while on vacation in Canada this summer. It works great and I was wishing I had bought more. Needless to say I was happy to find these online so I could buy more... They were great stocking stuffers! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: JARKEY
customer_reviews.text: THE FIRST TIME I SAW A JARKEY, MY DAUGHTER RECIEVED ONE AFTER SHE HAD AN OPERATION ON HER HAND AND CAN NOLONGER NOT OPEN JARS. I THOUGHT IT WAS THE GREATEST THING SO ORDERED 6 OF THEM, 2 FOR ME AND THE REST I'VE GIVEN TO FRIENDS WHO REALLY APPRECIATE THEM TOO. EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Marni Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love my JarKey
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted something to be able to open jars without damaging the lid. This JarKey is perƒect and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn E. Harkins

customer_reviews.title: This is more like a bottle cap opener
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a device that would grasp a stubborn screw on jar lid to help open it. This is more like a bottle cap opener.
customer_reviews.author: San Francisco artist

customer_reviews.title: It is useless.
customer_reviews.text: The product did not work as promised. It is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wesson

customer_reviews.title: Worked instantly
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I made hotdogs the other night and tried to open a jar of Sauer kraut, trying everything [wearing rubber gloves, trying to twist the lid with a rubber swimming cap, etc] unsuccessfully. As soon as this product arrived, I tried it on the jar and it worked instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Stranded Candid

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Everyone should have one in their kitchen drawer. Someone gave it to me as a gift years ago and I in turn gave this one as a gift. Works like a charm to release the vacuum seal, which is what makes it difficult to open jars.
customer_reviews.author: LauraJJ

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for Problematic Weak Hands
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jar opener at a friend's recommendation. I have arthritis so my hands are not the way they used to be. I wish I had known about this product sooner. It's made a big difference and made opening jars so easy. I don't have to depend on family members anymore. I highly recommend this jar opener especially for those with problematic hands.
customer_reviews.author: QB

customer_reviews.title: Works great, so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I've used this item to open things like pasta jars. I have only had the opportunity to use it a few times, but so far it has worked like a charm. It "magically" opens the jars effortlessly and instantly. I'm impressed! I will update the review is my opinion changes over time.
customer_reviews.author: Diana L

customer_reviews.title: WORKS ON LARGE JAR LIDS
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling to open large jars that are too wide for traditional jar openers . I had to tap around the lid with the butt of a knife and that's not safe on a glass jar. This device easily pops the lid.
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: No more jar opening trauma!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tool! I love it! I had gotten one for myself at a local store, and several friends have wanted one. I ordered one from Amazon for a friend, who loves it! No more jar opening trauma!
customer_reviews.author: SheltieGirlV

customer_reviews.title: Genius!
customer_reviews.text: No more thumping, tapping, dousing with hot water, etc.... Just place the BRIX at the jar cap and gently pry up, hear the "pop" immediately and easily screw the top off! These arthritic hands love this gizmo.
customer_reviews.author: leisfam

customer_reviews.title: Works just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Really works as advertised. It is the easiest way to loosen metal jar lids for removal. It releases the seal and the lids unscrew easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lona Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but it really works. I have arthritis in my hands & I just slip this Jarkey under a lid to release the seal & it opens easily. I am so pleased with this product. It really works.
customer_reviews.author: georgie

customer_reviews.title: No More Kitchen Knife Prying
customer_reviews.text: We haven't needed it yet. I arrived this afternoon and looks great. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: L'Chaim the Maggid

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had found this years ago
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My life of opening jars has just gotten so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: MtnStitcher

customer_reviews.title: Jarkey
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little device. I would give one to everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: It works on some jars but not all sizes - I wouldn't buy it if I knew this
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Terrific little gadget
customer_reviews.text: I just don’t have the strength in my hands that i had when I was younger , so this is wonderful asset for me.
customer_reviews.author: KPC 210

customer_reviews.title: Miracle jar opener!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing little gadget. As I get older in my grip gets weaker, this gadget allows me to never have difficulty opening up jars. It pops the vacuum and the jar opens right up without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Vogensen

customer_reviews.title: I love the way it makes stubborn jar lids pop off
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it makes stubborn jar lids pop off! Everyone should have one. This would be perfect for people with arthritis. Great product
customer_reviews.author: lynn marra

customer_reviews.title: Buy it and don't look back!
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my hands and struggled mightily with opening or popping the lids of jars. I have zero problems when I use the jarKey. It's a keeper in every way!
customer_reviews.author: 4annie

customer_reviews.title: What a great product. It solves one of my major problems ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. It solves one of my major problems opening vacuum jars. It arrived on time and was as presented.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I originally found this product in a local supermarket a while ago and foolishly only bought one before they stopped carrying them. The JarKey works wonderfully popping the seal on cans and jars of all sorts, making opening them a breeze. I just bought more here on Amazon to give away as gifts because my mom and my aunt (who has arthritis in her hands) were both so impressed that they each wanted one for their own kitchens.
customer_reviews.author: ESNYC

customer_reviews.title: Best jar opener ever!
customer_reviews.text: This, truly, is the easiest way to open a jar - no discussion!
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Best tool ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I have a Foodsaver and use this tool every single day because most stuff is stored in canning jars! Makes my day!!
customer_reviews.author: Morgine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's great for those of us who don't have any grip strength anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. I've been using them for years
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I've been using them for years, and I order new ones as they wear out. I also give them as gifts, and friends like them, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: jarred
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best jar opener. I have seen on a Cooking Show that this Jar Key is THE way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne M Bataille

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful little tool
customer_reviews.text: If you ever struggle with opening jars, this tool will come to your rescue. I used one at my daughters and was so amazed by how easy it made opening things that I bought several for my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great invention, truely works. I have purchased as gifts for all my family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K

customer_reviews.title: Super product, especially for anyone with limited hand strength
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, works great. Eliminates or reduces the need for twisting lid removal devices. What more needs to be said?
customer_reviews.author: Hoosierlen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Got a number of different jar openers for Xmas as I'm having trouble with jars and this is the one that I use least.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Durke

product_meta.title: BRIX Jarkey Jar Opener - The Easiest Way to open a Jar
product_meta.description: Jar Opener, 5.5" / 14cm, assorted colors, ABS plastic.World's easiest jar opener. Revolutionary and so simple! No twisting, no straining. Just lift, pop & unscrew lid . IT'S SO EASY.Endorsed by Arthritis Associations around the world. Dishwasher safe. Made in Denmark
feature_bullets: Jar Opener, 5.5" / 14cm, assorted colors, ABS plastic.
World's easiest jar opener. Revolutionary and so simple! No twisting, no straining. Just lift, pop & unscrew lid.
Endorsed by Arthritis Associations around the world.
